formalpara.title: Figure 1. Two views of the adult C. elegans intestine.
formalpara.para: A. An adult glp-4(bn2) C. elegans hermaphrodite, raised at the restrictive temperature to prevent formation of a gonad. Differential interference contrast image; red reveals fat droplets in the intestine (Nile Red Fluorescence); green reveals the presence of (indigestible) fluorescent polystyrene beads in the intestinal lumen. Scale bar = 0.1 mm.B. Scanning electron micrograph of a decapitated adult C. elegans hermaphrodite, showing intestine and gonad. (Photograph courtesy of Mr. Wei Dong, University of Calgary).
